description: Toxicology and poisoning clinical rules for poison detection and management

rules.name: Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
rules.recommendation: üö® **POISON EMERGENCY** - Remove from environment immediately, call 911. Carbon monoxide poisoning requires hyperbaric oxygen treatment.
rules.clinical_notes: Cherry red skin is late sign - headache and confusion are early

rules.name: Organophosphate Poisoning
rules.recommendation: üö® **POISON EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Requires atropine and pralidoxime. Remove contaminated clothing.
rules.clinical_notes: SLUDGE syndrome - Salivation, Lacrimation, Urination, Diarrhea, GI upset, Emesis

rules.name: Acetaminophen Overdose
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT MEDICAL CARE** - Go to ER immediately. N-acetylcysteine most effective within 8 hours of ingestion.
rules.clinical_notes: Often asymptomatic initially - hepatotoxicity develops 24-72 hours post-ingestion

rules.name: Opioid Overdose
rules.recommendation: üö® **OVERDOSE EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Administer naloxone (Narcan) if available. Provide rescue breathing.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic triad: CNS depression, respiratory depression, miosis (pinpoint pupils)

rules.name: Anticholinergic Poisoning
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **POISON EMERGENCY** - Call 911. 'Mad as a hatter, hot as a hare, red as a beet, dry as a bone, blind as a bat'
rules.clinical_notes: Classic anticholinergic syndrome - hyperthermia can be life-threatening

rules.name: Serotonin Syndrome
rules.recommendation: üö® **MEDICAL EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Stop serotonergic medications. Requires aggressive cooling and sedation.
rules.clinical_notes: Often triggered by drug interactions - can be rapidly fatal without treatment

rules.name: Cyanide Poisoning
rules.recommendation: üö® **POISON EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Requires antidote (hydroxocobalamin/sodium thiosulfate). Remove from source.
rules.clinical_notes: Rapid progression to cardiovascular collapse - minutes matter

rules.name: Methemoglobinemia
rules.recommendation: üö® **POISON EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Requires methylene blue antidote. Central cyanosis with normal oxygen saturation.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic: cyanosis that doesn't respond to oxygen therapy
